name: bluebash-micro-frontend-poc
description: Micro-Frontend Architecture POC using React, Vite, and Module Federation

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "HOST,CHAT,EMAIL" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run dev:host" "npm run dev:chat" "npm run dev:email"
scripts.build: npm run build:host && npm run build:chat && npm run build:email
scripts.preview: concurrently -n "HOST,CHAT,EMAIL" "npm run preview:host" "npm run preview:chat" "npm run preview:email"

author: Aman Sharma
